{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-N13U.jpg |image1_size = 125px |caption = Wireless-N300 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/RTN13U |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-N13U |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Was |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatousbsupport = <!-- Supported, Not Supported, Incompatible, or leave blank for unknown --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-N13 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = U |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/30/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Asus_RT-N13U |wlclass = N300 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTN13U |icid = 3568A-RTN13U |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3052; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 384 <!-- 384 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320DBTI-70G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S281632K-UC60;Samsung 852 K4S281632K-UC60; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt (Was), Wive-ng
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/05/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *EZ All-inOne Printer Sharing - USB Port *EZ Switch - Switch your operation mode only ONE-TOUCH (Router, Repeater, AP) *Enchanced Download Master - Download your files directly to the USB HDD when the computer is off. *Diagnostic and Bandwidth Management Tools - Dr. Surf, EZQoS
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Asus_RT-N13U On the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=61734 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=451357#451357 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} # Download asus-to-ddwrt.trx from ftp://www.dd-wrt.com/others/eko/BrainSlayer-V24-preSP2/06-12-10-r14594/Asus-RTN13U/ # Install Asus Utilities from here: http://support.asus.com.tw/download/download.aspx?product=11&model=RT-N13U&SLanguage=en-us # Disable windows firewall. # Power off the router, then keep the reset button pressed, and power on the router. Let go of the reset button once the power LED starts blinking. # Open Asus firmware restoration utility, and flash asus-to-ddwrt.trx # Wait 3 to 5 minutes after the flash is done, then reboot router. Now you should have dd-wrt running # Check for recommended builds [[Build_Links#Recommended_Builds|here]].
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-n13u |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-n13u |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt305x |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 22.03.7 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Upgrading== {{Upgrade dd-wrt}}
==Reverting== Refer this website...
http://klseet.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=79&Itemid=75
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== <font color=red><big>'''No JTAG'''</big></font>
